pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 24, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 24, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario 

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with H.E. Sheikh Abdullah Bin Mohammed Bin Saud Al-Thani, CEO of the Qatar Investment Authority and State Minister, State of Qatar.

Four Seasons Hotel
60 Yorkville Avenue 
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive at the hotel lobby no later than 2:30 p.m.

Media appearances

An interview with the Prime Minister will be livestreamed on VICE.com and VICE Canadaâ€™s Facebook page at 6:30 p.m. ET

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Jonah Keri Podcast.
